committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to establish the authorized area of Shenandoah National Park.

summary.text: Limits the authorized area of the Shenandoah National Park in Virginia to those acres to which fee simple title is vested in the United States as of the enactment of this Act. Prohibits any expansion of the park without congressional approval.

titles.title: A bill to establish the authorized area of Shenandoah National Park.
